channel.title: GSoC 2015 on Tony Tsai
channel.description: Recent content in GSoC 2015 on Tony Tsai

item.title: Optimization of Disk Usage for animint
item.description: Problem The easy test for becoming a potential student of animint project for GSoC 2015 is to use animint to visualize some data from your domain of expertise, and upload your visualization to the web using animint2gist. I used animint to visualize the data from the CDC’s State-level FluView, which is a main data source of my Ph.D. influenza research. The script for generating the FluView viz can be found in AnimintTest repository.
